member.name: P:Genesyslab.Platform.ApplicationBlocks.Commons.Protocols.ProtocolConfiguration.WarmStandbyUri
member.summary: Gets/Sets the standby URI for Warm Standby.

member.name: P:Genesyslab.Platform.ApplicationBlocks.Commons.Protocols.ProtocolConfiguration.WarmStandbyAttempts
member.summary: Gets/Sets the number of reconnection attempts for Warm Standby.

member.name: P:Genesyslab.Platform.ApplicationBlocks.Commons.Protocols.ProtocolConfiguration.WarmStandbySwitchovers
member.summary: Gets/Sets the number of primary/backup switchovers allowed for Warm Standby. If this parameter is not set, or if it is set to null, then an unlimited number of switchovers are allowed. If this parameter is set to 0 then switchover will not happen.

member.name: P:Genesyslab.Platform.ApplicationBlocks.Commons.Protocols.ProtocolConfiguration.WarmStandbyTimeout
member.summary: Gets/Sets the timeout (in milliseconds) between the reconnection attempts for Warm Standby.
